title.rendered: Samsung S8 Plus Pay Monthly Deals

content.rendered:
The Samsung S8 Plus is a popular phone as it offers many of the same functionality that the S9 models do, only now it sits second in the ranks it does not carry the same price tag.  A stunning handset that matches the smaller S8 but offers a bigger screen size for those who prefer a larger phone. With so many awesome features it remains a popular choice for many users so here are  some of the best pay monthly deals we have at the moment.

Check the Allowances

One of the best way to make sure you are getting the best S8 Plus deal for you is to check out the allowances.  We have so many awesome deals that the cheapest may not always be the best for you. The problem you will have by simply grabbing the least expensive deal is that you will be penalised for going over your allowances and this can turn a reasonable monthly deal into an budget busting nightmare.  Many contracts offer unlimited talk time and texts (provided the calls are in the UK) but data tends to be where people fall foul of allowances. Data applies to using the internet and certain apps when you are not connected to WiFi. It is worth investigating the level of data you currently use as it can save you money in the long run.

Currently we have two deals with EE which both come in at £33 a month, however one offers 20GB of data, while the other offers 1GB of data with a cash back reward. If you have WiFi at home and work, and use your friends when hanging out with them, then the lower data might be perfect, if not you may want to forgo a cash back option and grab the extra data which will benefit you in the long run.

The Perks

Different carriers have different packages on offer, and along with those come some network perks.  Vodaphone offer a whopping 20GB of data which might be perfect for some users, but if you are a music buff then EE are currently offering a 6 month free subscription to Apple music when you purchase one of their deals.  The Galaxy S8 Plus is a really great phone for music playback. In the box you will find their signature AKG headphones which are superb quality and offer the fullest, richest sound on playback.

Samsung has worked hard to make sure they have bought their A game when it comes to sound quality and have improved the phones no end when it comes to audio.  The S8 Plus is now a serious rival to the iPhone when it comes to audio playback quality.

We have managed to put together a wide range of deals that mean you can take advantage of the awesome quality of the Galaxy S8 Plus without breaking the budget.  Just be sure to check out the allowances to make sure you get a deal that covers your phone habits and doesn’t leave you short at the end of the month, or racking up a bill you can live without.
